By using this Event Lottery App, users agree to the following terms:

• Purpose: The app allows entrants to join event waiting lists, participate in random selection ('lottery') draws, and receive notifications regarding event registration.

• Privacy: Users must provide accurate personal information and consent to be contacted through in-app notifications or email.

• Fair Use: Lottery outcomes are determined randomly and cannot be influenced or appealed. Organizers must treat all entrants fairly and comply with app policies.

• Content & Conduct: Organizers are responsible for the accuracy and appropriateness of event details and uploaded media. Inappropriate or misleading content may be removed by administrators.

• Data Privacy: Personal data (name, contact info, device ID) is stored securely and used only for event registration, notification, and audit purposes.

• Account Removal: Administrators may remove users, events, or content that violate these terms without prior notice.

• Liability: The app and its administrators are not liable for event cancellations.
